doc.after: Most western philosophical traditions began in Ancient Greece in the 6th century BC The first philosophers are called Presocratics which designates that they came before Socrates whose contributions mark a turning point in western thought The Presocratics were from the western or the eastern colonies of Greece and only fragments of their original writings survive in some cases merely a single sentence
